skill_e.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.3) (+0.6) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by 30/35/40/45/50% for 3 seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to 40% of Malphite's Armor.

skill_i.tooltip: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

skill_q.tooltip: Deals 70/120/170/220/270 (+0.6) magic damage and steals 20/25/30/35/40% of the target's movement speed for 3 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals 200/300/400 (+0.8) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for 1.5 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by 10/15/20/25/30% (?). This effect is tripled while Granite Shield is active.

Active: Malphite's basic attacks create aftershocks for the next 5 seconds, dealing ? physical damage in a cone. His first attack after activating Thunderclap deals ? bonus physical damage to his target.
